unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Know Your Crowd, Yaar!**
normalised: social media and influencer marketing: know your crowd, yaar!

unnormalised: Forget guessing games! Understanding your followers on social media just got a whole lot easier. New and improved follower analytics are rolling out across platforms, and trust us, it's a game changer.
normalised: forget guessing games! understanding your followers on social media just got a whole lot easier. new and improved follower analytics are rolling out across platforms, and trust us, it's a game changer.

unnormalised: Think of it like this: you're planning a big Diwali party in Delhi. You wouldn't serve only Mysore Pak, would you? You gotta know if your guests prefer jalebi too!
normalised: think of it like this: you're planning a big Diwali party in Delhi. you wouldn't serve only Mysore Pak, would you? you gotta know if your guests prefer jalebi too!

unnormalised: These analytics now go way beyond just counting likes. We're talking deep dives into demographics – are they mostly Gen Z from Mumbai or older folks from Chennai? Interests – are they obsessed with cricket like Virat Kohli or into Bollywood gossip at 10:00 AM?
normalised: these analytics now go way beyond just counting likes. we're talking deep dives into demographics - are they mostly g-e-n z from Mumbai or older folks from Chennai? interests - are they obsessed with cricket like Virat Kohli or into Bollywood gossip at ten a.m.?

unnormalised: Understanding this helps influencers connect better. Imagine a fashion blogger knowing that 70% of their followers are college students looking for affordable styles before the 26/01 parade. Boom! Targeted content. Engagement through the roof!
normalised: understanding this helps influencers connect better. imagine a fashion blogger knowing that seventy percent of their followers are college students looking for affordable styles before the twenty sixth january parade. boom! targeted content. engagement through the roof!

unnormalised: Plus, brands can now seriously refine their influencer marketing campaigns. No more wasting Rs. on influencers whose audience doesn't vibe with their product. Scheduled updates begin from 12/12/2024. It's all about data-driven decisions now. Time to put on your thinking cap and get analyzing!
normalised: plus, brands can now seriously refine their influencer marketing campaigns. no more wasting rupees on influencers whose audience doesn't vibe with their product. scheduled updates begin from twelfth december two thousand and twenty four. it's all about data-driven decisions now. time to put on your thinking cap and get analyzing!
